about.title: About
about.description: I am a Full Stack Developer with over 6 years of experience in web development. I am passionate about creating modern, efficient, and user-friendly web applications.
about.careerObjectiveText: I am a dedicated developer who always strives to develop and contribute to the tech community.
about.name: Full Name
about.locationValue: Di An City, Binh Duong, Vietnam
about.careerGoalsDescription: As a dedicated developer, I aim to continuously grow and contribute to the tech community. Here are my key career objectives:
about.careerGoal1: Become a Technical Lead and mentor junior developers
about.careerGoal2: Master advanced technologies and contribute to open-source projects
about.careerGoal3: Build innovative solutions that make a positive impact

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.description1: Working on various projects including FPT Medicare, Engibase, Techknock, and Dragon Tiger
experience.description2: Developing and maintaining multiple client projects
experience.responsibility1: Design and develop scalable web applications
experience.responsibility2: Mentor junior developers and review code
experience.responsibility4: Build responsive web applications using modern frameworks
experience.responsibility5: Optimize database queries and improve application performance
experience.responsibility6: Collaborate with designers to improve UI/UX

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: My Learning Journey
education.description1: Major in Information Technology. GPA: 2.5/4. Focused on programming and information systems.
education.achievement1: Design Website Certificate - VNUHCM University of Science (2017)
education.achievement2: Programming PHP Certificate - VNUHCM University of Science (2018)

project1.title: FPT Medicare Website
project1.description: E-commerce medical website using WordPress, WooCommerce, and ACF.

project2.title: FPT Medicare API
project2.description: Backend API for mobile application using Django, MySQL, MongoDB, and Docker.

project3.title: Engibase
project3.description: Recruitment management system using PHP (Laminas), Kafka, Elasticsearch, Redis, and Docker.
